name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"194a1b09-67ee-455b-80c7-41dca4a38f3b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: mergeLeftRight","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5da48c57-88ab-4244-81e7-f1b0f2efb9cb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mergeLeftRight","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a fundamental building block of attribute resolution. Its job is to take a "left" side namespace (a resolved object or container) and join it with a "right" side attribute segment (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".save()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). It performs a context-aware merge, checking the internal scope and definition models to see if the joined result points to an existing, recognizable code entity.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1ad88e78-e1e2-4c06-a112-4e41968447c7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis must resolve chains of identifiers like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"config.database.port","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". The analyzer processes these one link at a time. After resolving ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"config.database","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it needs to find where ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"port","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" lives within that database object. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mergeLeftRight","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" handles this step. It is the logic that connects a base object to its attributes, methods, or internal variables, allowing the analyzer to traverse deep object hierarchies accurately.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f03a572c-0787-48d4-9e20-cec8d2e387b2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"334518ad-4711-40f0-96a3-587f8062a534","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Literal Pass-through:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the "left" side is already a resolved built-in type tag (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<str>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), the function simply returns that tag. Attributes on literals are usually handled separately or ignored if they don't change the underlying type.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e6203ab9-726c-4543-8e6b-804289d810f5","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Field Lookup:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It strips the leading dot from the "right" attribute string.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"538f47fd-6b36-4174-9ae2-9c855207ad51","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Search:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"e58d8be6-e597-44f9-9db3-b9335218368f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks if the "left" namespace has an associated ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ScopeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dd383cd1-7499-4736-816a-81629ab678b9","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If a scope exists, it uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"find_field","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to see if the attribute is defined within that scope (handling classes, external definitions, etc.).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e5955a66-063c-416a-bebb-07c39e75fe1a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If found, it returns the fully qualified namespace of that specific field.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"0170d3cb-a9f1-42c0-9993-43dba369bc0b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Namespace Joining:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If no scope is found or the field isn't explicitly defined, it uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"join_ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to combine the strings into a new potential namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3943f9f1-0bf9-4057-8fc0-fd520d47c829","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Validation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks if this newly joined namespace exists in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". If so, it returns the formal namespace; otherwise, it returns the raw joined string as a fallback.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"07414626-09d3-4068-ae03-7207c67279df","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Resolving ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bdfc9242-7d39-4e8e-a7ab-12d5a14fa3b0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The "left" is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.models.User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (an instance).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"24a56787-171f-4586-a464-136e6639428d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The "right" is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b03dc38e-338a-46d7-b1b9-e7f6c8112054","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"mergeLeftRight","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" looks at the scope for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.models.User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"55648977-54eb-4962-ab7a-0bcc3d1bd4ed","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It finds that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a registered field in that scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c6875887-c877-40e9-b3c1-cb4336a0a250","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It returns the full namespace ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.models.User.id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b49182a3-2fc1-4f5c-afee-9f6696fe0b51","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer now has a specific definition to track for this attribute access.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d13b0a77-eca8-4b7a-b116-67e8f6c7f0bf","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
